 Click fast 2013 1. Eligible Subscriber: a. Group 1 : Postpaid (individual subscribers only) Prepaid From 7 th to 9 th November: active 2-way communication. - Monthly bill payment from January 2013 to October is from VND200.000 to VND500.000 per cycle (including VAT). - If October cycle is not yet summed up, monthly bill payment from January to September will be evaluated Average load from January 2013 to October 2013 is from VND150.000 to VND500.000 per month (including VAT) Have phone calls made from either H? Nội, TP.HCM, Đ? Nẵng, Cần Thơ, Hải Ph?ng, or Bi?n H?a từ from 1 st October to 1 st November,2013. b. Group 2 : Loyalty member with Titan rank who has the date of birth in November and December 2013. c. Notice: Timeline: Group 1: From 11 th November to 15 th December,2013 Group 2: From 11 th November to 31 st December, 2013 Public service subscribers, operational subscribers and trial SIM card are not eligible. . 2. Content: Each subscriber will receive 1 gift + covering box + bag + greeting cards. a. Group 1: Promotion process Step 1: Eligible customers will receive a message which guides him/her to select the gift on the website Message content: "Quy khach dung mat khau xxxxxxx va truy cap dia chi http://KMOnline2013.mobifone.com.vn truoc 24h ngay xx/yy/2013 de nhan qua tu Mobifone.Sau thoi han nay, mat khau se het hieu luc.So luong qua tang co han. Hay chon cho minh mot mon qua phu hop ngay hom nay." xx: The last date that customers can select the gift, xx/yy is the end of validation after the 3-day period from the day of reception of the message. Example: Customers receive the message on 10 th November, 2013, xx/yy will be 13 th November, 2013. Step 2: Customer will use his/her phone number and the password sent in the message to log in to http://KMOnline2013.mobifone.com.vn in order to select the gift and the location to collect the gift. Step 3: Next, the system will inform the time when customers can receive the gift and necessary procedure. Customers cannot change the selection as well as the location. Step 4: Customer will receive gifts at chosen address. Gift collecting period: starting from the day after online selection and confirmation from the system. Customer can collect the gift within 3 days . Claiming gift procedure: Customer must: Bring the identification card (ownership verification). Bring the SIM card which receive the promotion message. Provide the given code of the promotion program. b. Group 2 : (can only select from gifts number 3, 5, 6, section 2c) According to the Online Promotion Procedure for high-ranked Loyalty members upon their birthdays (21 st April to 31 st December, 2013) . c. Gifts: STT Name Descriptions Selection 1 Movie tickets - Movie tickets of Lotte Cinema - Including: 02 tickets - Type:2D/ 3D - Time to use: Optional - Location: Optional, within Lotte Cineplex - Package of 02 2D tickets + 2 drinks - Package of 02 3D tickets 2 Laptop backpack - Backpack ? able to contain a laptop - Size: 40 cm x 30 cm x 12 cm (? 2 cm) - Color: Black - MobiFone Logo imprinted on the metal zippers and tag attached. Designated MobiFone Logo or Website printed on the front of the backpack. - Black with red patterns - Black with blue patterns 3 Lamp - IKEA reading lamp or equivalent - Type: Wall lamp or desk lamp. - Size: Lampshade diameter: 8,5 cm - Designated MobiFone Logo printed on the lampshade Color: Red, Yellow, Black and White 4 Multipurpose gadget - Multipurpose gadget, utilized in household use or travelling. - Material: Stainless steel. - Size: Folded: 11 cm, opened: 16cm (? 2 cm) - Uses: Pliers, can opener, cutter, filer - Color: Metallic, with decorations. - Designated MobiFone Logo printed on the gadget Metallic color with blue/red shade 5 Lunchbox set - Loc&Lock lunchbox or equivalent - Material: Plastic box, silicon lined cap and waterproof fiber bag - Set of 02 lunchboxes in bag with zipper. - MobiFone Logo embroidered on the tag and the lunchbox bag. Colors: Red/blue 6 Automatic umbrella - 2-way automatic foldable umbrella - Designated MobiFone logo printed on the product. Colors: Red, Blue, Silver and Black 7 Flashlight - Portable flashlight with advanced technology (ledchip), without any light bulb, energy saving and durable - MobiFone Logo printed on the product. Black flashlight with blue/red lining 3. 3D &#12398;&#20999;&#31526; 2 Laptop &#12398;&#12363;&#12400;&#12435; &#12469;&#12452;&#12474;&#65306;&#39640;&#12373; 40 cm &#65368;&#24195;&#12373; 30 cm &#65368;&#28145;&#12373; 12 cm &#33394;&#65306;&#40658;&#33394; MobiFone &#12398;&#12525;&#12468;&#12434;&#21360;&#21047;&#12377;&#12427; &#40658;&#12392;&#36196;&#12289;&#40658;&#12392;&#38738; 3 &#38651;&#27671;&#12473;&#12479;&#12531;&#12489; IKEA &#12398;&#38651;&#27671;&#12473;&#12479;&#12531;&#12489; &#31278;&#39006;&#65306;&#22721;&#25499;&#12369;&#12539;&#26426;&#12395;&#32622;&#12367;&#38651;&#27671;&#12473;&#12479;&#12531;&#12489; &#12469;&#12452;&#12474;&#65306; 8.5 cm MobiFone &#12398;&#12525;&#12468;&#12434;&#38651;&#27671;&#12473;&#12479;&#12531;&#12489;&#12434;&#21360;&#21047;&#12377;&#12427; &#38651;&#27671;&#12473;&#12479;&#12531;&#12489;&#12398;&#33394;&#65306;&#36196;&#12539;&#40644;&#33394;&#12539;&#40658;&#12539;&#30333; 4 &#12458;&#12540;&#12523;&#12497;&#12540;&#12497;&#12473;&#22120;&#20855; &#21407;&#26009;&#65306;&#12473;&#12486;&#12531;&#12524;&#12473;&#12473;&#12481;&#12540;&#12523; &#12469;&#12452;&#12474;&#65306;&#25240;&#12426;&#36820;&#12377;&#65306; 11 cm &#12289; &#33394;&#65306;&#37329;&#23646;&#33394; Mobifone &#12398;&#12525;&#12468;&#12434;&#21360;&#21047;&#12377;&#12427; &#33394;&#65306;&#37329;&#23646;&#33394;&#12392;&#36196;&#12289;&#37329;&#23646;&#33394;&#12392;&#38738;&#12356; 5 &#12362;&#24321;&#24403;&#31665; &#12362;&#24321;&#24403;&#31665;&#12398;&#33394;&#65306;&#36196;&#12539;&#38738; 6 &#20632; MobiFone &#12398;&#12525;&#12468;&#12434;&#20632;&#12395;&#21360;&#21047;&#12377;&#12427; &#20632;&#12398;&#33394;&#65306;&#36196;&#12539;&#38738;&#12539;&#37504;&#33394;&#12539;&#40658; 2013 &#24180; 11 &#26376; 11 &#26085;&#12363;&#12425; 2013 &#24180; 12 &#26376; 31 &#26085;&#12414;&#12391;&#12290; &#12288; &#49552;&#51060; &#48736;&#47476;&#44172; &#47560;&#50864;&#49828;&#47484; &#53364;&#47533;&#54620;&#45796; . 1. &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948; : a. &#44536;&#47353; 1 : &#54980;&#48520; &#51228; ( &#44536;&#47353; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#51201;&#50857; &#50504; &#46120; ) &#49440;&#48520;&#51228; 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 7 &#51068;&#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 9 &#51068;&#44620;&#51648; : &#49688;&#49888;&#44284; &#48156;&#49888;&#51060; &#44032;&#45733;&#54632; 2013 &#45380; 1 &#50900;&#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 10 &#50900;&#44620;&#51648;&#51032; &#51204;&#54868;&#50836;&#44552;&#51008; &#51452;&#44592;&#45817; 200.000 &#46041;&#48512;&#53552; 500.000 &#46041;&#44620;&#51648; ( &#48512;&#44032;&#49464; &#54252;&#54632;&#54620;&#45796; ). 10 &#50900;&#51032; &#51452;&#44592;&#45716; &#50500;&#51649; &#50756;&#47308;&#54616;&#51648; &#50506;&#51012; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; 1 &#50900;&#48512;&#53552; 9 &#50900;&#44620;&#51648; &#49884;&#51089;&#54620;&#45796; . 2013 &#45380; 1 &#50900;&#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 10 &#50900;&#44620;&#51648; &#54217;&#44508; &#52649;&#51204;&#44552;&#50529;&#51008; &#50900;&#45817; 150.000 &#46041;&#48512;&#53552; 500.000 &#46041;&#44620;&#51648;&#51064;&#45796; ( &#48512;&#44032;&#49464; &#54252;&#54632;&#54620;&#45796; ) 2013 &#45380; 10 &#50900; 1 &#51068;&#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 1 &#51068;&#44620;&#51648; Hà Nội, TP.HCM, Đà Nẵng, Cần Thơ, Hải Phòng, Biên Hòa &#50640;&#49436; &#51204;&#54868;&#47484; &#44152;&#45796; . b. &#44536;&#47353; 2: 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900;&#44284; 12 &#50900;&#50640;&#49436;&#49373;&#51068;&#51060; &#51080;&#45716; &#50864;&#47049;&#44256;&#44061; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#54000;&#53440;&#45700; &#54924;&#50896;&#51064;&#45796; . c. &#50976;&#51032; : &#51652;&#54665;&#44592;&#44036; : &#44536;&#47353; 1: 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 11 &#51068;&#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 12 &#50900; 15 &#51068;&#44620;&#51648; &#44536;&#47353; 2: 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 11 &#51068;&#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 12 &#50900; 31 &#51068;&#44620;&#51648; &#44277;&#47924;&#50896; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; , &#53580;&#49828;&#53944; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#49440;&#47932;+ &#48149;&#49828;+ &#44032;&#48169;+ &#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796;. a. &#44536;&#47353;1: &#45796;&#47492;&#44284; &#44057;&#51060; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648;&#47484; &#48155;&#44172; &#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . &#47928;&#51088;&#51032; &#45236;&#50857; : Quy khach dung mat khau xxxxxxx va truy cap dia chi http://KMOnline2013.mobifone.com.vn truoc 24h ngay xx/yy/2013 de nhan qua tu Mobifone.Sau thoi han nay, mat khau se het hieu luc.So luong qua tang co han. Hay chon cho minh mot mon qua phu hop ngay hom nay." . 3 &#52264; : &#44536; &#45796;&#51020;&#50640; &#49884;&#49828;&#53596;&#51008; &#49440;&#47932;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49884;&#44036;&#44284; &#54596;&#50836;&#49688;&#49549;&#51012; &#53685;&#48372;&#54644;&#46300;&#47532;&#44192;&#45796; &#6018;&#6071;&#6031;&#6021;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6100; 13/11/2013&#6101; &#6023;&#6086;&#6048;&#6090;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6072;2&#6102; &#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6016;&#6076;&#6026;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6026;&#6078;&#6040;&#6098;&#6036;&#6072;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043; 2c) &#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; online &#6050;&#6084;&#6041;&#6047;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016;&#6031;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6041;&#6076;&#6042;&#6050;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6082;&#6020;&#6032;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6017;&#6098;&#6038;&#6047;&#6091;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6065;&#6016;&#6070;&#6047;&#6017;&#6077;&#6036;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6031;&#6047; ;&#6040;&#6070;&#6023;&#6071;&#6016; (21/4 - 31/12/2013) . c. &#6016;&#6070;&#6026;&#6076;&#6102; &#6043;.&#6042; &#6016;&#6070;&#6026;&#6076; &#6050;&#6034;&#6071;&#6036;&#6098;&#6036;&#6070;&#6041;&#6037;&#6043;&#6071;&#6031;&#6037;&#6043;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6021;&#6098;&#6021;&#6081;&#6016;&#6033;&#6081;&#6047; 16cm (&#6050;&#6070;&#6021;&#6017;&#6075;&#6047; ? 2 cm) - - &#6040;&#6075;&#6017;&#6035;&#6070;&#6033;&#6072;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6055;&#6036;&#6016;&#6042;&#6030;&#6093;&#6102; &#6043;&#6084;&#6048;&#6088;,&#6036;&#6078;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6050;&#6036;&#6091;,&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;,&#6017;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091; - &#6049;&#6076;&#6048;&#6098;&#6018;&#6084;MobiFone &#6031;&#6098;&#6036;&#6070;&#6025;&#6043;&#6078;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6030;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;&#6032;&#6020;&#6091;&#6026;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6050;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6070;&#6041;&#6100; - -&#6038;&#6098;&#6042;&#6072;&#6035; &#6049;&#6076;&#6048;&#6098;&#6018;&#6084; ​MobiFone &#6017;&#6070;&#6020;&#6043;&#6078; &#6022;&#6096;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6030;&#6092;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6048;&#6040;/&#6038;&#6030;&#6092;&#6017;&#6080;&#6044;/ &#6038;&#6030;&#6092;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;/&#6038;&#6030;&#6092;&#6017;&#6098;&#6040;&#6085; - &#6038;&#6098;&#6042;&#6072;&#6035;&#6049;&#6076;&#6048;&#6098;&#6018;&#6084;MobiFone &#6038;&#6072;&#6043;&#6078;&#6037;&#6043;&#6071;&#6037;&#6043;&#6100; &#6038;&#6071;&#6043;&#6038;&#6030;&#6092;&#6017;&#6098;&#6040;&#6085;&#6022;&#6098;&#6076;&#6031;&#6017;&#6080;&#6044;/ &#6060;&#6022;&#6098;&#6035;&#6076;&#6031;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6048;&#6040; 3. &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6102; &#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 11/11/2013 &#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 31/12/2013
